venue.address_1: Exit 6E off rte 3 immediate rt at 90 Broad St Sunoco, Nashua
venue.name: Nashua Welcome Center / Rest Area

item.description: The task, should you choose to accept it, it to spread the message of Ron Paul to Nashua Republicans and Independents. You will have one day to complete this task. You will be given a list of address and instructions on what to do upon arriving at the meeting place. Your participate could make or break the future of this great nation of ours....
item.name: Canvassing in Nashua
